fullText:
Armored Warlord

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Warlord, Battlefront Leader class feature, proficiency with chainmail
Benefit: You gain proficiency with scale armor, and you increase your number of healing surges by one.


Update (4/13/2010)
In the Prerequisite entry, at “, proficiency with chainmail” to the end of the list of prerequisites.

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 131.
name: Armored Warlord

benefit: You gain proficiency with scale armor, and you increase your number of healing surges by one.
